content: > use these codes to save when you buy > multiple patterns > - saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns > - saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns > - saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns > > add all patterns to cart for discount > limit one use per purchase the high line sweater is a ribbed crochet pullover featuring buttons at the shoulder and a unique crochet ribbing stitch throughout its oversized construction makes this a simple sweater to put together and ensures maximum coziness all winter long this pattern uses single_crochet half_double_crochet increases decreases and foundational stitches to create simple rectangles that are assembled together it is written in us crochet terminology finished sizes xs to 3xl body panel width in inches 20 22 24 26 28 30 32 corresponding bust sizes would be 40 44 48 52 56 60 64 ……………………………………………………………………………… the pdf is beautifully formatted for easy printing and downloading it includes a complete materials list abbreviations and stitch definitions pattern notes with additional resources schematic and table with measurements in sizes xs to 3xl written instructions ……………………………………………………………………………… pattern is available only in english ……………………………………………………………………………… making finished items you can sell finished products made from this pattern by giving credit to me as the designer and linking to the original blog post pattern please be respectful and do not sell or distribute this pattern in any way especially as your own instead share the original blog post link ……………………………………………………………………………… return policy there are no returns on digital files please contact me with any further questions ……………………………………………………………………………… thanks for browsing find me at website - www 1dogwoof com instagram - www instagram com/1dogwoof facebook - www facebook com/onedogwoof youtube - www youtube com/1dogwoof pinterest - www pinterest com/1dogwoof twitter - www twitter com/1dogwoof
